da.feedback_content:
Hej Wildly,

Min feedback:



---
Teknisk info
da.spot_no_gps: GPS er ikke understøttet af din browser.
da.spot_change_month: Skift måned i menuen for at se dine andre fund.
da.spot_delete_confirm: Vil du slette dette fund og alle tilhørende billeder?
da.spot_delete_all_confirm: Er du HELT sikker på, at du vil slette ALLE dine hemmelige steder og alle tilhørende billeder? Dette kan ikke fortrydes.
da.gallery_swipe_or_click_to_close: Swipe for fotos • Klik for at lukke
da.naturbasen_explainer: Naturbasen er Danmarks nationale artsportal. Se billeder af planten i forskellige stadier og tjek, om andre har fundet den i dit lokalområde netop nu.
da.detail_preservation_drying_preparation: Klargøring: Skær svampene i helt jævne skiver på 3-5 mm. Brug kun sunde, faste eksemplarer.
da.detail_preservation_drying_oven: I ovn: Fordel skiverne på en bagerist (ikke plade). Sæt ovnen på 40-45°C varmluft. Vigtigt: Sæt en træske i klemme i ovndøren, så dampen kan slippe ud.
da.detail_preservation_drying_time: Tid: Typisk 6-12 timer. De er færdige, når de 'knækker' sprødt. Hvis de bøjer, er de ikke tørre nok og vil mugne i glasset.
da.detail_preservation_drying_tip: Tip: Mal de tørre svampe til mel i en kaffekværn. Det er den ultimative 'Umami-støv' til saucer.
da.detail_preservation_frying_method: Metode: Svampe må aldrig fryses rå (undtagen Karl Johan). De skal varmes først, så de frigiver deres naturlige væske for at fjerne overskydende vand.
da.detail_preservation_frying_process: Proces: Læg svampene på en tør pande ved middel varme. Når vandet vælter ud, lader du det koge helt væk. Tilsæt derefter en smule neutral olie (længere holdbarhed end smør) og steg let i 2 min.
da.detail_preservation_frying_freeze: Frys: Køl helt af og pak i poser. Pres luften ud for at undgå frostbrand.
da.detail_preservation_frying_shelf_life: Holdbarhed: 6 mdr. med smør, 12 mdr. med olie eller helt uden fedt.
da.detail_preservation_pickling_brine: Lage: 1 del eddike (min 5%), 1 del sukker, 1 del vand. Kog op med laurbær og peber.
da.detail_preservation_pickling_process: Proces: Giv svampene et opkog direkte i lagen i 5-8 minutter. Skum urenheder af undervejs.
da.detail_preservation_pickling_tip: Tip: Hæld på skoldede glas og lad dem modne mindst 2 uger før brug. Eddiken skal have tid til at 'falde til ro'.
da.detail_learn_techniques_guide: Se guide til tørring, frysning og syltning

en.save_in_cloud_expl: Log in to securely save your spots online
en.feedback_content:
Hej Wildly,

My feedback:



---
Technical info
en.hab_mixed_description: Mix of deciduous and coniferous trees
en.spot_no_gps: GPS is not supported by your browser.
en.spot_change_month: Change month in the menu to see your other finds.
en.spot_delete_confirm: Do you want to erase this find and all attached photos?
en.spot_delete_all_confirm: Are you SURE you want to erase ALL your secret spots and images? This action cannot be undone.
en.gallery_swipe_or_click_to_close: Swipe for photos • Click to close
en.naturbasen_explainer: Naturbasen is Denmarks national species portal. See photos of the plant in different life stages and check, whether others have found it in your local area.
en.detail_preservation_drying_preparation: Preparation: Cut the mushrooms into even slices of 3-5 mm. Only use healthy, firm specimens.
en.detail_preservation_drying_oven: In the oven: Spread the slices on a baking rack (not a baking tray). Set the oven to 40-45°C fan oven. Important: Place a wooden spoon in the oven door to allow the steam to escape.
en.detail_preservation_drying_time: Time: Typically 6-12 hours. They are ready when they 'crack' crisply. If they bend, they are not dry enough and will go mouldy in the jar.
en.detail_preservation_drying_tip: Tip: Grind the dried mushrooms into flour in a coffee grinder. This is the ultimate 'umami dust' for sauces.
en.detail_preservation_frying_method: Method: Mushrooms should never be frozen raw (except Porcini mushroom). They must be heated first so that they release their natural juices to remove excess water.
en.detail_preservation_frying_process: Process: Place the mushrooms in a dry pan over medium heat. When the water comes out, let it boil away completely. Then add a little neutral oil (longer shelf life than butter) and fry lightly for 2 minutes.
en.detail_preservation_frying_freeze: Freezing: Cool completely and pack in bags. Press out the air to avoid freezer burn.
en.detail_preservation_frying_shelf_life: Shelf life: 6 months with butter, 12 months with oil or without fat.
en.detail_preservation_pickling_brine: Brine: 1 part vinegar (min. 5%), 1 part sugar, 1 part water. Boil with bay leaves and pepper.
en.detail_preservation_pickling_process: Process: Boil the mushrooms directly in the brine for 5-8 minutes. Skim off any impurities during cooking.
en.detail_preservation_pickling_tip: Tip: Pour into sterilised jars and leave to mature for at least 2 weeks before use. The vinegar needs time to 'settle'
en.detail_out_of_season: Outside of season? Be extra cautious.
en.detail_learn_techniques_guide: See guide to drying, freezing, and preserving
